title: Subchapter B - Minimum Wage Orders
content:
Subchapter B - Minimum Wage Orders

State Regulations

Part 135 - Repealed

Part 136 - Repealed

Part 137 - Repealed

Part 138 - Repealed

Part 139 - Repealed

Part 140 - Repealed

Part 141 - BUILDING SERVICE INDUSTRY (Subpart 141-1 to 141-3)

Part 142 - MISCELLANEOUS INDUSTRIES AND OCCUPATIONS (Subpart 142-1 to 142-3)

Part 143 - REGULATIONS APPLICABLE TO EACH NONPROFITMAKING INSTITUTION WHICH CERTIFIES IT WILL PAY THE STATUTORY MINIMUM WAGE TO EACH EMPLOYEE IN LIEU OF BEING COVERED UNDER A MINIMUM WAGE ORDER (ยง 143.0 to 143.8)

Part 144 - New York State Minimum Wage Requirements Concerning Employment Covered By The Minimum Wage Provisions Of The Federal Fair Labor Standards Act [repealed]
Part 145 - Regulations Applicable To Each Nonprofitmaking Institution Which Certifies It Will Pay One Dollar An Hour To Each Employee In Lieu Of Being Covered Und [repealed]
Part 146 - HOSPITALITY INDUSTRY (Subpart 146-1 to 146-3)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
